headline.main: BAKER'S LINK TO RING IS TOLD AT SPY TRIAL; Admission That He Was Courier for Nazis Read Into Record

lead_paragraph: Franz Joseph Stigler's connection with an alleged German espionage ring was outlined in detail yesterday in a statement he made to agents of the Federal Bureau of Investigation after his arrest last June. The statement was read into the record at the Brooklyn espionage trial by Assistant United States Attorney T. Vincent Quinn.
abstract: Stigler-Sebold meeting film shown; Stigler's admission that he was German courier read into record
